a mutation in both copies of the gene is necessary. It is important to note that people inherit an increased risk of developing mannose-binding lectin deficiency, not the condition itself. Not all people who inherit mutations in this gene will develop the condition.",GHR,mannose-binding lectin deficiency
What are the treatments for mannose-binding lectin deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of mannose-binding lectin deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mannose-bin
